verses.verse: You therefore, <S%G3767><s%> my son, <S%G5043><s%> be strong <S%G1743><s%> in the grace <S%G5485><s%> that is in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

And the things that you have heard <S%G191><s%> of me among <S%G1223><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> witnesses, <S%G3144><s%> the same <S%G5023><s%> commit <S%G3908><s%> you to faithful <S%G4103><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> who <S%G3748><s%> shall be able <S%G2425><s%> to teach <S%G1321><s%> others <S%G2087><s%> also. <S%G2532><s%>
You therefore <S%G3767><s%> endure <S%G2553><s%> hardness, <S%G2553><s%> as a good <S%G2570><s%> soldier <S%G4757><s%> of Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

No <S%G3762><s%> man <S%G3762><s%> that wars <S%G4754><s%> entangles <S%G1707><s%> himself with the affairs <S%G4230><s%> of this life; <S%G979><s%> that he may please <S%G700><s%> him who has chosen <S%G4758><s%> him to be a soldier. <S%G4758><s%>
And if <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> strive <S%G118><s%> for masteries, yet is he not crowned, <S%G4737><s%> except <S%G3362><s%> he strive <S%G118><s%> lawfully. <S%G3545><s%>
The farmer <S%G1092><s%> that labors <S%G2872><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be first <S%G4413><s%> partaker <S%G3335><s%> of the fruits. <S%G2590><s%>
Consider <S%G3539><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> I say; <S%G3004><s%> and the Lord <S%G2962><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> you understanding <S%G4907><s%> in all <S%G3956><s%> things.

Remember <S%G3421><s%> that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> of the seed <S%G4690><s%> of David <S%G1138><s%> was raised <S%G1453><s%> from the dead <S%G3498><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to my gospel: <S%G2098><s%>

Wherein <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3757><s%> I suffer <S%G2553><s%> trouble, <S%G2553><s%> as an evil <S%G2557><s%> doer, <S%G2557><s%> even to bonds; <S%G1199><s%> but the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is not bound. <S%G1210><s%>

Therefore I endure <S%G5278><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things for the elect's <S%G1588><s%> sakes, that they may also <S%G2532><s%> obtain <S%G5177><s%> the salvation <S%G4991><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is in Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> with eternal <S%G166><s%> glory. <S%G1391><s%>
It is a faithful <S%G4103><s%> saying: <S%G3056><s%> For if <S%G1487><s%> we be dead <S%G4880><s%> with him, we shall also <S%G2532><s%> live <S%G4800><s%> with him:
If <S%G1487><s%> we suffer, <S%G5278><s%> we shall also <S%G2532><s%> reign <S%G4821><s%> with him: if <S%G1487><s%> we deny <S%G720><s%> him, he also <S%G2548><s%> will deny <S%G720><s%> us:
If <S%G1487><s%> we believe <S%G569><s%> not, yet he stays <S%G3306><s%> faithful: <S%G4103><s%> he cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> deny <S%G720><s%> himself. <S%G1438><s%>

Of these <S%G5023><s%> things put <S%G5279><s%> them in remembrance, <S%G5279><s%> charging <S%G1263><s%> them before <S%G1799><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> that they strive <S%G3054><s%> not about words <S%G3054><s%> to no <S%G3762><s%> profit, <S%G5539><s%> but to the subverting <S%G2692><s%> of the hearers. <S%G191><s%>

Study <S%G4704><s%> to show <S%G3936><s%> yourself <S%G4572><s%> approved <S%G1384><s%> to God, <S%G2316><s%> a workman <S%G2040><s%> that needs <S%G422><s%> not to be ashamed, <S%G422><s%> rightly dividing <S%G3718><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of truth. <S%G225><s%>
But shun <S%G4026><s%> profane <S%G952><s%> and vain <S%G2757><s%> babblings: <S%G2757><s%> for they will increase <S%G4298><s%> to more <S%G4119><s%> ungodliness. <S%G763><s%>
And their word <S%G3056><s%> will eat <S%G3542><s%> <S%G2192><s%> as does a canker: <S%G1044><s%> of whom <S%G3739><s%> is Hymenaeus <S%G5211><s%> and Philetus; <S%G5372><s%>

Who <S%G3748><s%> concerning <S%G4012><s%> the truth <S%G225><s%> have erred, <S%G795><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> that the resurrection <S%G386><s%> is past <S%G1096><s%> already; <S%G2235><s%> and overthrow <S%G396><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> of some. <S%G5100><s%>

Nevertheless <S%G3305><s%> the foundation <S%G2310><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> stands <S%G2476><s%> sure, <S%G4731><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> this <S%G5026><s%> seal, <S%G4973><s%> The Lord <S%G2962><s%> knows <S%G1097><s%> them that are his. And, Let every <S%G3956><s%> one that names <S%G3687><s%> the name <S%G3686><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%> depart <S%G868><s%> from iniquity. <S%G93><s%>

But in a great <S%G3173><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> there are not only <S%G3440><s%> vessels <S%G4632><s%> of gold <S%G5552><s%> and of silver, <S%G693><s%> but also <S%G2532><s%> of wood <S%G3585><s%> and of earth; <S%G3749><s%> and some <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3303><s%> to honor, <S%G5092><s%> and some <S%G3588><s%> to dishonor. <S%G819><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> purge <S%G1571><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> from these, <S%G5130><s%> he shall be a vessel <S%G4632><s%> to honor, <S%G5092><s%> sanctified, <S%G37><s%> and meet <S%G2173><s%> for the master's <S%G1203><s%> use, and prepared <S%G2090><s%> to every <S%G3956><s%> good <S%G18><s%> work. <S%G2041><s%>

Flee <S%G5343><s%> also <S%G1161><s%> youthful <S%G3512><s%> lusts: <S%G1939><s%> but follow <S%G1377><s%> righteousness, <S%G1343><s%> faith, <S%G4102><s%> charity, <S%G26><s%> peace, <S%G1515><s%> with them that call <S%G1941><s%> on <S%G1941><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> out of a pure <S%G2513><s%> heart. <S%G2588><s%>
But foolish <S%G3474><s%> and unlearned <S%G521><s%> questions <S%G2214><s%> avoid, <S%G3868><s%> knowing <S%G1492><s%> that they do engender <S%G1080><s%> strifes. <S%G3163><s%>

And the servant <S%G1401><s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> not strive; <S%G3164><s%> but be gentle <S%G2261><s%> to all <S%G3956><s%> men, apt <S%G1317><s%> to teach, <S%G1317><s%> patient, <S%G420><s%>

In meekness <S%G4236><s%> instructing <S%G3811><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> that oppose <S%G475><s%> themselves; if <S%G3379><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> peradventure <S%G3379><s%> will give <S%G1325><s%> them repentance <S%G3341><s%> to the acknowledging <S%G1922><s%> of the truth; <S%G225><s%>

And that they may recover <S%G366><s%> themselves out of the snare <S%G3803><s%> of the devil, <S%G1228><s%> who are taken <S%G2221><s%> captive <S%G2221><s%> by him at <S%G1519><s%> his will. <S%G2307><s%>
